summary: Reverts the jailtime changes in Requiem, for those that experience dire starvation or extremely long load screens after being imprisoned.
descriptionHtml:
Does at the title says. It changes the game settings that Requiem edits back to vanilla values. The changed values are:

iCrimeMaxNumberofDaysinJail from 100 to 7

iCrimeDaysInPrisonMod from 10 to 100

It's a personal mod I made for myself that I decided to release. While I do agree jail time should logically be more lengthy, the lengthy load screens & the torture of not getting food for 100 days is terrible to deal with. I made this to mend these issues I have.

Works with any version of Requiem.
author: Segolia94
